articles.title: 'Black fungus' strikes fear in India as Covid deaths pass 300,000 - NBC News
articles.description: India became the third country to record 300,000 Covid-19 deaths on Monday amid growing fears about the danger posed by a potentially fatal fungal infection.
articles.content:
